name: PALSOFT India
description:
PALSOFT India is a custom web application development company located in Slik City and Diamond City Surat - Gujarat. At PALSOFT, we provide customized solutions from small CMS websites to e-commerce websites to ERP web applications. Providing quality work to our clients is our main motto. Our client range from India to the UK, and we are still growing.
 
Services Offered:
- HTML / HTML 5 / CSS 3.0 / JavaScript / jQuery / Knockout / Angular / Kendo UI / JEasyUI
- Wordpress / eCommerce / WooCommerce / OpenCart / Magento / eBay Store Desinging
- Web Services
- Web Application Development
- Mobile Application Development
- CMS Website Design
- Web Hosting
- Search Engine Optimization
- ERP Solution
- Database Design & Development (MSSQL, ACCESS, MYSQL)
- Customize Software Development
